# -*- ck2.events -*-
# Audax Validator EnableCommentMetadata

# Written by zijistark via trait-notify.pl v1.03.1 on Sat Feb  2 16:16:03 2019 (Pacific)

#########################################
#       TRAIT NOTIFICATION EVENTS       #
#########################################

namespace = emf_notify

# NOTE: One should never call these event IDs directly but instead should use
# the named scripted effects in emf_notify_effects.txt to deliver notifications
# for the add/remove of traits. That way, when traits are added or changed,
# their trait IDs and thus event IDs here may change, but their named effects
# will always resolve to the correct event. Additionally, the scripted effects
# actually add/remove the trait as well so as to be able to avoid redundant
# notifications and catch coding errors.


##################################################
#    Trait Gain Notification Forwarder Events    #
# emf_notify.1 through emf_notify.1000 reserved  #
##################################################

# emf_notify.1 -- added amateurish_plotter (Amateurish Plotter)
# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes

	immediate = {
		event_target:emf_notify_char = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.2001 } }
	}
}

		event_target:emf_notify_char = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.3067 } }
	}

character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.1207

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes

	immediate = {
		event_target:emf_notify_char = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.3207 } }
	}
}

	immediate = {
		event_target:emf_notify_char = { character_event = { id = emf_notify.3433 } }
	}
}

####################################################
#          Trait Gain Notification Events          #
# emf_notify.2001 through emf_notify.3000 reserved #
####################################################

# emf_notify.2001 -- added amateurish_plotter (Amateurish Plotter) to FROM [notification]
# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.2001
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2001.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2001.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2001.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2001.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

	id = emf_notify.2012
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2012.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2012.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2012.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2012.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				}
			}
		}
	}

			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2039.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2053.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2053.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2067.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2067.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2067.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2067.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

					any_ward = { character = FROM }

				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2094.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2108.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2108.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

		text = emf_notify.2122.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2122.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2122.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2122.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2149.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2149.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.2163
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2163.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2163.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2163.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2163.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.2176
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2176.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2176.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2176.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2176.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2190.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2190.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2204.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2204.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2204.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2204.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				}
			}
		}

				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2231.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2247.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2247.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}

# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.2262

		text = emf_notify.2262.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2262.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2262.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM

					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2275.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2289.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2289.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}

			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2324.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				vassal_of = ROOT

				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM

	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2373.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2387.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2387.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }

		text = emf_notify.2401.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2401.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2401.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2401.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2428.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2428.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

# emf_notify.2442 -- added emf_cannot_inherit (Cannot Inherit) to FROM [notification]
# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.2442
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2442.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2442.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2442.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.2442.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3010.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3024.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3024.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}

	notification = yes

	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3051.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3065.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3079.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}

		}

# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.3093
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3093.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3093.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3093.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3093.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3120.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }

		text = emf_notify.3134.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3134.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3134.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3161.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				guardian = { character = FROM }

		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3202.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3216.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3216.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}

# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.3230
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3230.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3230.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3230.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3230.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3260.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3260.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {

# emf_notify.3274 -- removed kow_tow_travels (On Kowtow) from FROM [notification]
# Audax Validator "." Ignore_1005
character_event = {
	id = emf_notify.3274
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3274.desc_self
		trigger = { character = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3274.desc_councillor
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3274.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {

				character = FROM

					is_councillor = yes

					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3287.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3301.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3301.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3337.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3358.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3358.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3385.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3399.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3399.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}

					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3426.desc
		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					is_close_relative = FROM
					any_spouse = { character = FROM }
					any_ward = { character = FROM }
					guardian = { character = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	notification = yes

	option = { name = OK }
}

				is_councillor = yes
				vassal_of = ROOT
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = emf_notify.3440.desc_relation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_close_relative = FROM
				any_spouse = { character = FROM }
				any_ward = { character = FROM }
				guardian = { character = FROM }
			}
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_councillor = yes
					vassal_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}

		trigger = {
			NOR = {
				character = FROM
